characterDescription: Moelach is one of the Unmade, a mysterious group of odious spren on Roshar. He is ancient, considered to be evil by Taravangian, and appears to be responsible for the death rattles uttered by some people when they die. These utterances have, thus far, offered Taravangian the best way he's found to augment the Diagram.

characterDetails.Notes:
Brandon has confirmed that the Unmade are Splinters of Odium. Odium splintered himself and created the Unmade to be his influence on Roshar. It is through the Unmade that Odium may be able to influence people in how they think or act.
(It is, therefore, worrisome that Taravangian’s hope to "save humankind" is being guided by such a one.)
